aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The aspect model PartAsSpecified belongs to the Part Catalogue. A PartAsSpecified represents a certain OEM catalog part on part number level. Providing a digital representation of the part as specified by the OEM. The link to the serialized part is done via the partId, this can only be done if the respective DT was provided by the supplier within the value chain.

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The aspect model PartAsSpecified belongs to the Part Catalogue. A PartAsSpecified represents a certain OEM catalog part on part number level. Providing a digital representation of the part as specified by the OEM. The link to the serialized part is done via the partId, this can only be done if the respective DT was provided by the supplier within the value chain.
Encapsulation for data related to the part type
The classification of the part type.
The entity encapsulating the properties of the part classification
Name of the part as assigned by the part owner.

PartID as assigned by the part owner. The PartID identifies the part in the part owner's data space. The PartId does not reference a specific instance of a part and thus should not be confused with the serial number.

This is the version of the part. The engineering will at times supercede an older part version by a newer one, which might have different material aspects, physical dimensions etc., still maintaining compatibility.
The item category (component, product, software, assembly, tool, raw material) the part belongs to
Description of the part of interest
Encapsulation for data related to the validity period.
Start date of the validity period.
End date of the validity period.

The aspect model PartAsSpecified belongs to the Part Catalogue. A PartAsSpecified represents a certain OEM catalog part on part number level. Providing a digital representation of the part as specified by the OEM. The link to the serialized part is done via the partId, this can only be done if the respective DT was provided by the supplier within the value chain.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The aspect model PartAsSpecified belongs to the Part Catalogue. A PartAsSpecified represents a certain OEM catalog part on part number level. Providing a digital representation of the part as specified by the OEM. The link to the serialized part is done via the partId, this can only be done if the respective DT was provided by the supplier within the value chain.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
The characteristic of the part classification

Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
A part type must be placed into one of the following classes: 'component', 'product', 'software', ‘assembly’, 'tool', or 'raw material'.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
The characteristic of the part type.
Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.
Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.
The characteristic of the validity period.
